fields.name: FIL_ALL_VALID_RANGE
fields.help_text: Compared variable is checked for NaNs and invalid values.

fields.name: FIL_ISMN_GOOD
fields.help_text: Soil moisture quality flag is "G" for good.

fields.name: FIL_C3S_FLAG_0
fields.help_text: Data flag = 0 indicates good data, no inconsistencies detected

fields.name: FIL_C3S_NO_FLAG_1
fields.help_text: Data flag != 1 indicates temperature > 0 C and no snow cover

fields.name: FIL_C3S_NO_FLAG_2
fields.help_text: Data flag != 2 indicates no places with dense vegetation

fields.name: FIL_C3S_MODE_ASC
fields.help_text: Data captured when satellite was ascending

fields.name: FIL_C3S_MODE_DESC
fields.help_text: Data captured when satellite was descending

fields.name: FIL_GLDAS_UNFROZEN
fields.description: Soil not frozen and no snow-cover
fields.help_text: Corresponding depth soil temperature > 1.0 C and Snow depth water equivalent < 0.001

fields.name: FIL_ASCAT_UNFROZEN_UNKNOWN
fields.description: Soil not frozen (or state not known)

fields.name: FIL_ASCAT_NO_CONF_FLAGS
fields.help_text: No confidence flags (indicating problems with the data) are set

fields.name: FIL_ASCAT_NO_PROC_FLAGS
fields.help_text: No processing flags (indicating data values are changed based on thresholds) are set

fields.name: FIL_SMOS_QUAL_RECOMMENDED
fields.description: Soil moisture values are retrieved and recommended
fields.help_text: Soil moisture values are retrieved and recommended (Quality_Flag == 0)
